author: bago
msg: FIX ClassCastException when the VUT does not implement VUTManagement services. Instead raise the appropriate exception.

author: skitching
msg: Correctly handle lookup of beans in viewcontroller scope when the viewcontroller bean-definition has a nested aop:scopedProxy tag.

author: dag
msg: DERBY-3667 SQL roles: Make CURRENT_ROLE check that the role is still valid
This patch, derby-3667-1, makes CURRENT_ROLE, before returning the
value, check if the current role set, if any, is still applicable for the
current user. If it is no longer applicable, the current role is set to NONE.
